arts.ttl: Inter Milan & Italy Wing-Back Out For Revenge Against Norway: ‘We Know How The Reverse Fixture Ended’
arts.sum: Inter wing-back Federico Dimarco says Italy are fully focused on putting things right when they face Norway at San Siro tonight. The Azzurri are unlikely to overturn the goal difference gap needed to top the group. However, the Inter defender insists the objective is clear: respond to the heavy defeat suffered in Oslo.
